duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to achieve sales goals and drive revenue growth.
Lead and mentor a team of sales professionals, providing guidance and support in achieving sales targets.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine sales tactics.
Negotiate and manage relationships with key clients, ensuring retention and expanding business opportunities.
Implement revenue management strategies to optimize pricing and maximize profitability.
Forecast sales targets and develop sales training programs to enhance team performance.
Represent the sales department in internal and external programs and initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
